title: Env. legislation - Safe Drinking Water Act

content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following. 
(A) Safe Drinking Water Act
(B) Clean Water Act
(C) Comprehensive Environmental Response Compensation and Liability Act (CERCLA)
(D) Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
(E) Toxic Substances Control Act
content.question: Requires minimum safety standards for community water supplies

choices.label: Comprehensive Environmental Response Compensation and Liability Act (CERCLA)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
